tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE face_recognition_data (
    face_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    face_vector FLOAT[],
    image_url TEXT,
    image_metadata JSON
)

CREATE TABLE FaceData (
    face_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    vector_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMetadata(image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (vector_id) REFERENCES FaceVectors(id)
);

CREATE TABLE face_images (
    face_image_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    face_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (face_id) REFERENCES face_vectors(face_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES image_metadata(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_faces (
    user_face_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    face_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (face_id) REFERENCES face_vectors(face_id)
);
